sentences.en: a blithe disregard for the facts
A blithe heart makes a blooming visage.
Buck Mulligan at once put on a blithe broadly smiling face.
sentences.cn: 勃克·穆利根的脸上立刻绽满欢快的笑容.

sentences.en: Can chill the blood of ska - ters blithe and free.
sentences.cn: 寒冷不能带走滑雪者的欢快和自由.

sentences.en: He blithe guru spray - painting smiley faces along Wall Street.
sentences.cn: 他并非华尔街上假装笑脸、漠不关心的专家.

sentences.en: He drove with blithe disregard for the rules of the road.
sentences.cn: 他开车时全然不顾交通法规。

sentences.en: He showed a blithe indifference to her feelings.
sentences.cn: 他显得毫不顾及她的感情.

sentences.en: She continued to work in blithe spirit in spite of all difficulties.
sentences.cn: 就算是面对困难,她以然会以高昂的精神工作.

sentences.en: She said "hi" with the blithe assurance of someone who knew how much she'd been missed.
sentences.cn: 她高兴地说了声“嗨”，好像确信大家非常想念她似的。

sentences.en: She showed a blithe indifference to others'feelings.
sentences.cn: 她毫不考虑别人的感情.

sentences.en: Shelley called the skylark a " blithe spirit " because of its happy song.
sentences.cn: 雪莱把云雀说成是 “ 欢乐的精灵 ”,因为它的歌声令人陶醉.

sentences.en: Suzanne's feelings about food and eating had gone from blithe unconcern to anxiety.
sentences.cn: 苏珊娜对饮食的态度已经从无所谓变成了焦虑不安。

sentences.en: The autumn air , blithe and vivacious, elated Philip.
sentences.cn: 秋天的空气愉快而舒畅, 使菲利浦意气风发.

sentences.en: Tonight, however, she was even in a blithe mood than usual.
sentences.cn: 但是, 今天晚上她比往常还要高兴.

sentences.en: We have men getting killed out there, Blithe!
sentences.cn: 外面有弟兄受到敌人攻击,布洛依!

sentences.en: You know why you hid in that ditch, Blithe?
sentences.cn: 你知道你为何躲在那个壕沟里面吗, 布洛依?

trans.tran_cn: 欢乐的，愉快的，轻率的，漫不经心的，无忧无虑的
